channel.title: La Resistance - The Battle Starts Here!
channel.description:
[center][center][size=18pt][b]La Resistance[/b][/size][/center] [size=10pt][center][b]The Battle Starts Here[/b][/center]
[color=red][center]La Resistance was a server that has been brough back from the dead. It was originally owned by Jamian who is a popular RSPS youtuber and goes by the name Apehist. I have teamed up with him to remake this server to the fullest of its ability! Come join now while you can and get ahead in Beta. We currently have a 5 Man advertisement team so come release date you will start off just like the rest of our players.[/center]
8 Hours into our fist day of Beta: [img]http://puu.sh/aFNfr/fcb4e244d1.jpg[/img]
[center][size=18pt][b]Links[/b][/size][/center] [center][url=http://www.lrv3.info]The Battle Starts Here![/url][/center]
[center][size=18pt][b]Updates[/b][/size][/center] [spoiler]-Dwarf Multi Cannon -Single and Duo Slayer task -Boss Slayer Tasks -Gloabal server Announcements -Working Trivia bot -8 Minigames -11 Boss's -5 Floors of Dungeoneering -Team Dungeoneering -Working Construction -Teleporting Interfaces -Armadyl Staff and Runes -Crafting Armadyl Runes -100% Money Pouching storing up to 25B -Working Quick Prayers -100% Summoning -Processed Quest tab updating -100% Working Galkon Clan Chat -FIxed, Resizable, and Fullscreen client -Dicing and Mithril Seeds -New Pest Control System added -Castle Wars system -Clan wars in the making -FFA Minigame -4 Quests -FULLY working bank tabs and bank system[/spoiler]
[center][size=18pt][b]Media[/b][/size][/center] [spoiler][img]http://puu.sh/aw85x/b64ab9cadd.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/aw6C7/2af738ae30.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/aw6EA/26bfe8cf2b.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/aw6HB/8d1f15f340.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/aw6IJ/a753af9e1f.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/aw6Ko/27b7768caa.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/aw6M1/4b6046d493.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/aw6Ng/a06869f7d1.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/aw6PS/9b1895b665.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/aw6Qj/8bbba735c8.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/aw6TM/e423c06ccb.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/aw6W2/7058684dd9.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/aw7hG/c123a39503.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/aw7lR/be1a6779dd.jpg[/img][/spoiler][/center]
[center][size=18pt][b]Links[/b][/size][/center] [center][url=http://www.lrv3.info]The Battle Starts Here![/url][/center]

item.title: La Resistance - The Battle Starts Here!
item.dc:creator: @eclipse_rsps eclipse rsps
item.description:
@eclipse_rsps wrote:

[center][center][size=18pt]La Resistance[/size][/center]
[size=10pt][center]The Battle Starts Here[/center]

[color=red][center]La Resistance was a server that has been brough back from the dead. It was originally owned by Jamian who is a popular RSPS youtuber and goes by the name Apehist. I have teamed up with him to remake this server to the fullest of its ability! Come join now while you can and get ahead in Beta. We currently have a 5 Man advertisement team so come release date you will start off just like the rest of our players.[/center]
